casebody.data:
Tuesday, February 15, 1994

MOTION DOCKET

94-108. State ex rel. Howard v. Ferreri.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of relator’s application for alternative writ of mandamus,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application for alternative writ be, and the same is hereby, denied, effective February 14, 1994.

Douglas, J., dissents.
